column5: Could be some really good deals here for anyone in the Toronto area.  http://www.woodscanada.com/  Good bye to a great product....
Just FYI it has been going on for a few weeks so a lot of the good stuff like tents and packs are gone but still some sleeping bags etc.  Sad part is all product will now be made offshore.

Just came back from the sale.  Almost nothing good left, although they had one Arctic 2 Star sleeping bag left for $ 169.99.  All the good packs are gone, no canvas left and no prospector tents.  Bug jackets are only in small and x-small.  They have a ton of parkas left though for at least 50 % off.
Ya, it's almost a novelty to find something made in the western hemisphere.
